hai yahii ek KHaraabii mirii tanhaa.ii kii

kisii kalii kisii gul me.n kisii chaman me.n nahii.n
vo ra.ng hai hii nahii.n jo tire badan me.n nahii.n

in charaaGo.n me.n tel hii kam thaa
kyuu.n gila phir hame.n havaa se rahe

uu.nchii imaarato.n se makaa.n meraa ghir gayaa

Dar ham ko bhii lagtaa hai raste ke sannaaTe se
lekin ek safar par ai dil ab jaanaa to hogaa

jidhar jaate hai.n sab jaanaa udhar achchhaa nahii.n lagtaa
mujhe paamaal rasto.n kaa safar achchhaa nahii.n lagtaa

kabhii jo KHvaab thaa vo paa liyaa hai
magar jo kho ga.ii vo chiiz kyaa thii

agar tumhaarii anaa hii kaa hai savaal to phir chalo

is se pahle ki be-vafaa ho jaa.e.n

us ko judaa hu.e bhii zamaana bahut hu.aa
ab kyaa kahe.n ye qissa puraanaa bahut hu.aa

aa.nkh se duur na ho dil se utar jaa.egaa
vaqt kaa kyaa hai guzartaa hai guzar jaa.egaa

zindagii se yahii gila hai mujhe
tuu bahut der se milaa hai mujhe

dil ko tirii chaahat pe bharosa bhii bahut hai
aur tujh se bichha.D jaane kaa Dar bhii nahii.n jaataa

kisii ko ghar se nikalte hii mil ga.ii manzil
ko.ii hamaarii tarah umr bhar safar me.n rahaa

tum takalluf ko bhii iKHlaas samajhte ho 'faraaz'

kis kis ko bataa.e.nge judaa.ii kaa sabab ham

hu.aa hai tujh se bichha.Dne ke ba.ad ye ma.aluum

ab ke ham bichh.De to shaayad kabhii KHvaabo.n me.n mile.n

ranjish hii sahii dil hii dukhaane ke liye aa
aa phir se mujhe chho.D ke jaane ke liye aa

sahraa se ho ke baaG me.n aayaa huu.n sair ko
haatho.n me.n phuul hai.n mire paa.nv me.n ret hai

mai.n suKHan me.n huu.n us jagah ki jahaa.n
saa.ns lenaa bhii shaa.irii hai mujhe

mai_n jis ke saath ka.ii din guzaar aayaa huu.n
vo mere saath basar raat kyuu.n nahii.n kartaa

tamaam naaKHudaa saahil se duur ho jaa.e.n
samundaro.n se akele me.n baat karnii hai

ik tiraa hijr daa.imii hai mujhe
varna har chiiz aarzii hai mujhe

vo jis kii chhaa.nv me.n pachchiis saal guzre hai.n
vo pe.D mujh se ko.ii baat kyuu.n nahii.n kartaa

daastaa.n huu.n mai_n ik taviil magar
tuu jo sun le to muKHtasar bhii huu.n

ye ek baat samajhne me.n raat ho ga.ii hai
mai_n us se jiit gayaa huu.n ki maat ho ga.ii hai

apnii mastii me.n bahtaa dariyaa huu.n mai_n
kinaara bhii huu.n bha.nvar bhii huu.n

teraa chup rahnaa mire zehn me.n kyaa baiTh gayaa
itnii aavaaze.n tujhe dii.n ki galaa baiTh gayaa

mai_n ki kaaGaz kii ek kashtii huu.n
pahlii baarish hii aaKHirii hai mujhe

mai_n ab kisii kii bhii ummiid to.D saktaa huu.n
mujhe kisii pe bhii ab ko.ii e'tibaar nahii.n

kaise kaise banaa diye chehre
apnii be-chehragii banaate hu.e

mai.n aa.iino.n ko dekhe jaa rahaa thaa
ab in se baat bhii karne lagaa huu.n

haath jis ko lagaa nahii.n saktaa
us ko aavaaz to lagaane do

ye jo mai.n huu.n zaraa saa baaqii huu.n
vo jo tum the vo mar ga.e mujh me.n

us ne naasuur kar liyaa hogaa
zaKHm ko shaa.erii banaate hu.e

ek darvesh ko tirii KHaatir
saarii bastii se ishq ho gayaa hai

mai.n ne tasviir phe.nk dii hai
magar kiil diivaar me.n ga.Dii hu.ii hai

ek hii baat mujh me.n achchhii hai
aur mai.n bas vahii nahii.n kartaa

mai.n ne chaahaa thaa zaKHm bhar jaa.e.n
zaKHm hii zaKHm bhar ga.e mujh me.n

ye saat uTh pa.Dosii kahaa.n se aa.e mire
tumhaare dil me.n to ko.ii na thaa sivaa.e mire

tum pe kyaa KHaak asar hogaa mire shero.n kaa

us kii tah se kabhii daryaaft kiyaa jaa.uu.ngaa

kisii galii me.n kiraa.e pe ghar liyaa us ne
phir us galii me.n gharo.n ke kiraa.e ba.Dhne lage

kitaab-e-ishq me.n har aah ek aayat hai
par aa.nsu.o.n ko huruuf-e-muqatti.aat samajh

bichha.D ga.e to ye dil umr bhar lagegaa nahii.n
lagegaa lagne lagaa hai magar lagegaa nahii.n

nikaal laayaa huu.n ek pinjre se ik parinda
ab is parinde ke dil se pi.njra nikaalnaa hai

Gam-e-duniyaa bhii Gam-e-yaar me.n shaamil kar lo
nashsha ba.Dhtaa hai sharaabe.n jo sharaabo.n me.n mile.n

is qadar musalsal thii.n shiddate.n judaa.ii kii
aaj pahlii baar us se mai.n ne bevafaa.ii kii

bandagii ham ne chho.D dii hai 'faraaz'
kyaa kare.n log jab KHudaa ho jaa.e.n

qurbate.n laakh KHuub-suurat ho.n
duuriyo.n me.n bhii dilkashii hai abhii

aashiqii me.n 'miir' jaise KHvaab mat dekhaa karo

dil bhii paagal hai ki us shaKHs se vaabasta hai
jo kisii aur kaa hone de na apnaa rakkhe

Dhuu.nD uj.De hu.e logo.n me.n vafaa ke motii
ye KHazaane tujhe mumkin hai KHaraabo.n me.n mile.n

aur 'faraaz' chaahiye.n kitnii mohabbate.n tujhe

muddat hu.ii ik shaKHs ne dil to.D diyaa thaa

vo TuuTte hu.e rishto.n kaa husn-e-aaKHir thaa
ki chup sii lag ga.ii dono.n ko baat karte hu.e

ai dost ham ne tark-e-mohabbat ke baavajuud
mahsuus kii hai terii zaruurat kabhii kabhii

ham ko un se vafaa kii hai ummiid
jo nahii.n jaante vafaa kyaa hai

ye mujhe chain kyuu.n nahii.n pa.Dtaa
ek hii shaKHs thaa jahaan me.n kyaa

mujh ko to hosh nahii.n tum ko KHabar ho

dil kii choTo.n ne kabhii chain se rahne na diyaa
jab chalii sard havaa mai.n ne tujhe yaad kiyaa

jaise baarish se dhule sehn-e-gulistaa.n 'amjad'
aa.nkh jab KHushk hu.ii aur bhii chehraa chamkaa

chehre pe mire zulf ko phailaa.o kisii din

ba.De sukuun se Duube the Duubne vaale jo
saahilo.n pe kha.De the bahut pukaare bhii

jis taraf tuu hai udhar ho.ngii sabhii kii nazre.n
iid ke chaa.nd kaa diidaar bahaana hii sahii

badan me.n jaise lahuu taaziyaana ho gayaa hai
use gale se lagaa.e zamaana ho gayaa hai

uTho ye manzar-e-shab-taab dekhne ke liye
ki nii.nd shart nahii.n KHvaab dekhne ke liye

mere siine se zaraa kaan lagaa kar dekho

agar yuu.nhii mujhe rakkhaa gayaa akele me.n
baraamad aur ko.ii is makaan se hogaa

masruuf hai.n kuchh itne ki ham kaar-e-mohabbat

jis se puuchhe.n tire baare me.n yahii kahtaa hai

le de ke apne pas faqat ek nazar to hai
